content.c_venueAddress: St Martin's Ln, Charing Cross, London WC2N 4ES
content.name: The Magic Flute

primaryPhoto.description:
Simon McBurney’s five-star production of THE MAGIC FLUTE returns to the ENO at the London Coliseum, promising an evening of magic, romance and timeless music from February 2024!
The cast includes Norman Reinhardt making his ENO debut as Tamino alongside David Stout as Papageno. They are joined by former ENO Harewood Artist Soraya Mafi as Pamina and the fiery coloratura of ENO debutante Rainelle Krause as the manipulative Queen of Night. The ENO Chorus and Orchestra are conducted for the first time by Erina Yashima.
Book your THE MAGIC FLUTE tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
